resources.string:
Hi, my name is Natacha. 

I love playing coop boardgame. 

I was treasurer 2 years in a boardgame association, then I created mine with my husband and I was the president the first 3 years. 

Fun fact is we met us through boardgames. 

We're playing video games too, but not same type : I like puzzle games, point&click ; my husband like multiplayers games (Rocket League, GTA, Sea of Thieves) 

Now, we have 2 children (2 and 5 years old) and we hope they'll love that too! 

"We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing." - George Bernard Shaw
